description: This file defines an Angular component for editing a single note. It includes UI templates, styles, and logic for binding a note object to form controls, and saving changes through a service.

classes.name: NoteEditorComponent
classes.description: An Angular component enabling editing of a single note, with data-binding and save functionality.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initialization logic for the component, currently only references the notes service.

methods.name: ngOnChanges
methods.description: Handles updates to the input note, creating a copy to avoid side-effects.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Calls the NotesService to upsert (update or insert) the current note.
